snippet.title: Heroes of Mythic Might - Idle RPG Card Game
snippet.description: Heroes of Mythic Might is an idle RPG card game featuring beautiful oriental artworks. It will transport you into a fantasy world based on Eastern myths and legends. In the game, the players collects an entourage of travel companions, and forges divine weapons to tame spirits and cast down demons. There are many heroes and skins to be unlocked. Start your mythical adventure now!
